DOC.brief_title: Is The Sudden Onset Dizziness A Symptom Acute Liver Dysfunction ?
DOC.detailed_description: Dizziness one common complaint among patient admit emergency department ( ED ) . In case , etiology remain unclear . Dizziness broad differential diagnosis . The initial symptom ALD include many general complaint . The diagnosis acute liver dysfunction ( ALD ) usually make initial symptom , physical examination , biochemical test , include liver function test ( LFTs ) high sensitivity specificity . LFTs include albumin , bilirubin , coagulation factor ( Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time ( aPTT ) International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) ) , liver enzymes , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , alkaline phosphate ( ALP ) , y-glutamyl transpeptidase ( GGT ) , marker hepatic damage . Aim study investigate whether SOD symptom ALD , necessity LFTs patient SOD ED , cost analysis LFTs .
